definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: simple, poss. as open-minded;—[[פֶּ֫תִי]] Pr 9:4 +, [[פֶָּתִי]] Ps 19:8 +; pl. [[פְּתָאיִם]] (Ges:§ 93 x) Ps 116:6 + 6 t. Pr; [[פְּתָיִים]] Ps 119:130, Pr 22:3; [[פְּתָיִם]] Pr 1:22, Pr 1:32; —simple, as subst. concr.: open to the instruction of wisdom or folly, Pr 9:4, Pr 9:16; believing every word Pr 14:15; lacking [[עָרְטָה]] Pr 1:14, Pr 8:5, Pr 19:25; needing [[בין]] Ps 119:130, [[חכטה]] Ps 19:8, Pr 21:11; in good sense, [[שׁמר]] ´[[פתאים י]] Ps 116:8 ´[[י]] preserveth ths simple-minded; but usu. tendency to bad sense ; [[פתאים]] love [[פתי]] Pr 1:22; inherit [[אִוֶּלֶת]] Pr 14:18, are easily enticed, misled and go back Pr 1:32, Pr 7:7, Pr 9:6, Pr 22:3 = Pr 27:12; they need atonement Ez Eze 45:20 (‖[[שׁגה ]]).
